template<class T>
void VCollisionLayout::setItemPos ( QList< T * > const &  items,
T *  item,
qreal  x,
qreal  minY = 0.0,
qreal  spacing = 0.0 
) [inline]

Sets the position of an item according to the collision-based layout.

Parameters:
[in] items The list of items. Assumed to be already in correct order.
[in] item The item to position.
[in] x The x coordinate for the item's position.
[in] minY The minimum y coordinate.
[in] spacing The spacing between the items.

template<class T>
void VCollisionLayout::updateItemMove ( QList< T * > &  items,
T *  item,
qreal  minY = 0.0,
qreal  spacing = 0.0 
) [inline]

Updates the positions of the items when one item is being moved.

Parameters:
[in] items The list of items.
[in] item The item that is being moved.
[in] minY The minimum y coordinate.
[in] spacing The spacing between the items.
Remarks:
The list of items is assumed to initially have correct top-bottom ordering and positioning.
